author: affiliates@fandango.com
title: 10. Gold $3.5M
text: Mcconaughey is awesome as always! Great movie!... By rbade00 Quirky - McConahy gives a strong performance but his character makes me very uncomfortable.... By dickensbrian08 I got really sleepy with this one! Had I high hopes due to when Matthew takes on a character in dept but this just wasn't a slam dunk or even a dribble of the ball... Treasury! By tmcoffeyus Don't think main character had to look so repulsive. Typical Hollywood overkill. Great ending allowing som pondering - what next?... MAKES YOU PONDER LIABILITY By thedoctor777 It's a hair too long; but it's interesting the way governments, wall street, banks and the true risk takers operate. Each one trying to screw over the other and then it's amusing who gets taken and... Gold By AC7085 The movie begins slow, but the drama builds up with the necessary suspense to give it a 4 out of 5!... By beckieup Matthew McConaughey is a despicable slime ball!! In a good way! Almost a grifter by nature, he plays the role flawlessly! In fact, all of the cast were great! A long movie....it seemed to have 4... McConaughey and Ramirez are great! By ml1211 The two of them, down and out, desperate prospect ors draw you in. Their characters are well developed and wonderfully played. The fact that it's based on s true story just makes it even better.... By Jadenkbush Overall, this was a pretty good movie. Matthew's performance was good and the acting from the other cast was moderate, but overall it was good. The plot made sense and the ending was something I... Meh! Twas alright! By Staydown046 The only thing i liked about this movie was it had a great story line. Not much to really rate. 1.5/5 Stars and flat 2/10 score....
